item.title: 欧盟官员称十月底前很难看到中国电动汽车价格协议
item.description: 一位欧盟高级官员说，作为避免欧盟关税谈判的一部分，欧盟委员会已收到中国商会提出的最低价格，其中包括几家电动汽车生产商，以及一些个别出口商分别提出的最低价格。【原文：The European Commission has received minimum price offers from the Chinese Chamber of Commerce covering several EV producers and separately from a number of individual exporters as part of negotiations to avert EU tariffs, a senior EU official said.】

item.title: 万达制药公司拒绝循环制药公司的第二次收购要约
item.description: 万达制药公司（Vanda Pharmaceuticals）周一拒绝了英国 Cycle Pharmaceuticals 公司的第二份收购提案，该提案对这家制药商的估值为每股 8 美元，尽管在美国食品及药物管理局（FDA）否决了其胃病药物后，万达的股价出现了下跌。【原文：Vanda Pharmaceuticals on Monday rejected UK-based Cycle Pharmaceuticals' second takeover proposal, which values the drugmaker at $8 per share despite a drop in Vanda's stock following the FDA's rejection of its stomach condition drug.】

item.title: 德国工会抨击 "咄咄逼人 "的特斯拉解雇工会代表
item.description: 德国工会 IG Metall 指责美国汽车制造商特斯拉柏林附近工厂的管理层在解雇了一名工会代表后，对试图组织工会的工人采取了 "激进策略"。【原文：German union IG Metall has accused management at US carmaker Tesla's plant near Berlin of "aggressive tactics" against workers trying to unionise after it fired one of its representatives on the works council.】

item.title: 德国各州誓言携手拯救大众汽车生产基地
item.description: 路透社在周一看到的一份联合立场文件中称，德国四个有大众汽车公司存在的州希望共同努力，确保这家陷入困境的汽车制造商不会关闭任何工厂。【原文：The four German states with a Volkswagen presence want to work together to ensure that the struggling carmaker does not shut any of its plants, the states' economy ministries said in a joint position paper seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟 "希望公平竞争"，但仍在与中国谈判汽车关税问题
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周一表示，欧盟希望在汽车关税问题上与中国公平竞争，并正在与中国政府就价格承诺或在欧洲投资等机制进行谈判，以寻求解决方案。【原文：The European Union wants a level playing field with China on car tariffs and is negotiating with Beijing on mechanisms such as price commitments or investments in Europe as a solution, European Commission chief Ursula von der Leyen said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利：未来美国经济将有更多温和降息举措
item.description: 美国明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周一表示，随着2%的通胀目标迫在眉睫，央行未来可能会有更多的降息举措。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said on Monday more rate cuts likely lie ahead for the central bank as the 2% inflation target looms into sight.】

item.title: 塔瓦雷斯：欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税将加速欧洲工厂倒闭
item.description: Stellantis 公司首席执行官周一表示，欧盟对中国产电动汽车征收关税将加速当地汽车制造商关闭在欧洲的工厂，因为关税将推动中国制造商在欧洲建厂，加剧产能过剩问题。【原文：The EU's duties on Chinese-made electric cars will speed up plant closures in Europe by local automakers, as tariffs will push Chinese manufacturers to build facilities in Europe, adding to overcapacity problems, Stellantis' CEO said on Monday.】

item.title: Adobe 开始推出人工智能视频工具，向 OpenAI 和 Meta 发起挑战
item.description: Adobe 公司周一表示，它已开始公开发布一种人工智能模型，该模型可以根据文字提示生成视频，它加入了越来越多的公司的行列，试图利用生成式人工智能颠覆电影和电视制作。【原文：Adobe on Monday said it has started publicly distributing an AI model that can generate video from text prompts, joining the growing field of companies trying to upend film and television production using generative artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称汇丰就成本和控制问题调查中国平安财富业务
item.description: 多位消息人士称，汇丰控股有限公司正在审查其中国数字财富业务品智的开支和运营控制，此举可能导致裁员，并标志着该银行对该部门的雄心突然逆转。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is reviewing expenses and operational controls at its China digital wealth business Pinnacle, in a move that could result in layoffs and mark an abrupt reversal of the lender's ambition for the unit, several sources said.】

item.title: 标普全球称，未来十年各国可能更频繁地违约
item.description: S&P全球评级机构周一在一份报告中警告说，由于债务增加和借贷成本上升，未来十年各国可能比过去更频繁地出现外币债务违约。【原文：Countries are likely to default more frequently on their foreign currency debt in the coming decade than they did in the past due to higher debt and an increase in borrowing costs, agency S&P Global Ratings warned in a report on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，埃利奥特要求与西南航空公司举行特别会议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已通知西南航空公司，要求召开特别股东大会。【原文：Elliott Investment Management has informed Southwest Airlines that it is requesting a special shareholder meeting, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 波音微调裁员计划，主要买家抨击 777X 喷气式飞机延迟交付
item.description: 波音公司宣布裁员 10%，并增加 50 亿美元的费用，这对员工、客户和投资者来说都是严峻的考验。【原文：Boeing faces a crucial test with employees, customers and investors after announcing 10% job cuts and $5 billion in charges as a crippling machinists strike enters a fifth week.】

item.title: 欧佩克再次下调 2024、2025 年全球石油需求增长预期
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）周一下调了对2024年全球石油需求增长的预测，以反映今年迄今收到的数据，同时还下调了对明年的预测，这是该生产国集团连续第三次下调预测。【原文：OPEC on Monday cut its forecast for global oil demand growth in 2024 reflecting data received so far this year and also lowered its projection for next year, marking the producer group's third consecutive downward revision.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪警告欧盟关税将提高价格并阻止买家购买
item.description: 中国电动车巨头比亚迪周一警告说，欧盟计划对中国制造的电动车征收关税将导致价格上涨，使买家望而却步。【原文：The EU's planned tariffs on Chinese-made EVs will lead to higher prices and deter buyers, Chinese EV giant BYD warned on Monday, adding the tariffs proposed for its vehicles were not a fair, but that it had also not challenged them.】

item.title: 康泰伦特将出售新泽西工厂
item.description: 康泰伦特（Catalent）和阿登纳（Ardena）两家公司周一表示，已同意将其位于新泽西州萨默塞特（Somerset）的口服药物开发和小规模生产设施出售给私营合同药品生产商。【原文：Catalent has agreed to sell its oral drug development and small-scale manufacturing facility in Somerset, New Jersey to private contract drug manufacturer Ardena, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 丹麦灵北制药公司将以 26 亿美元收购长板制药公司
item.description: 丹麦灵北制药公司（H Lundbeck A/S）同意以 26 亿美元的价格收购长板制药公司（Longboard Pharmaceuticals），以扩大其治疗神经罕见病的产品线，这使得这家美国公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨了 43.9%。【原文：Denmark's H Lundbeck A/S has agreed to buy Longboard Pharmaceuticals in a $2.6 billion deal to boost its pipeline of treatments for neuro-rare conditions, sending shares of the U.S.-based company up 43.9% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 通用汽车与巴克莱银行签署长期信用卡合作协议
item.description: 通用汽车公司和巴克莱银行周一表示，双方已签署长期信用卡合作协议。【原文：General Motors and Barclays have signed a long-term credit card partnership agreement, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间交易中国经济陷入困境，美债收盘，中国疑虑重重
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 为什么巴西种了那么多大豆却吃得那么少？
item.description: 巴西的美食中心圣保罗可能以其珍贵的烤肉和奢华的寿司而闻名，但一些高档餐厅正在使用一种新颖的明星配料：大豆。【原文：Brazil's foodie hub Sao Paulo may be best known for its prized cuts of grilled meat and lavish sushi spreads, but some upscale restaurants are featuring a novel star ingredient: soy.】

item.title: 本周财报和经济数据密集，期货涨跌互现
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货涨跌不一，投资者期待着本周的第三季度财报和重要数据，以寻求对世界最大经济体健康状况的了解。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were mixed on Monday as investors looked ahead to a week packed with third-quarter earnings reports and crucial data, seeking insights into the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 阿西莫格鲁、约翰逊和罗宾逊荣获 2024 年诺贝尔经济学奖
item.description: 瑞典皇家科学院周一表示，达龙-阿斯莫格鲁、西蒙-约翰逊和詹姆斯-罗宾逊因 "对制度如何形成并影响繁荣的研究 "而荣获 2024 年诺贝尔经济学奖。【原文：Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson and James Robinson won the 2024 Nobel economics prize "for studies of how institutions are formed and affect prosperity", the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局对超过 3.5 万辆福特汽车的后摄像头故障展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周一表示，已开始对美国约 35,950 辆福特 Flex 汽车的后摄像头故障隐患进行初步评估。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Monday that it has opened a preliminary evaluation into about 35,950 Ford Flex vehicles in the United States over a potential rear-camera failure.】

item.title: 苏德意志报》称，运动人士希望禁止瑞银进入美国养老金市场
item.description: 据《南德意志报》（Sueddeutsche Zeitung）周一报道，一个运动团体希望瑞银失去美国法规的豁免权，因为该豁免权允许瑞士银行在违反银行业规定的情况下在美国养老金市场开展业务。【原文：A group of campaigners wants UBS to lose its exemption from U.S. regulations that allows the Swiss bank to operate in the American pension market despite breaking banking rules, Sueddeutsche Zeitung reported on Monday.】

item.title: 哈里斯针对黑人男性提出新的经济建议
item.description: 民主党总统候选人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）周一公布了针对黑人男性的新政策提案，其中包括可免除的小型企业贷款和进入新的合法娱乐大麻行业。【原文：Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris unveiled new policy proposals aimed at Black men on Monday that include forgivable small business loans and access to a new legal recreational marijuana industry.】

item.title: 中国出口不及预期，唯一亮点逐渐消失
item.description: 中国 9 月份出口增长大幅放缓，进口也意外减速，大幅低于预期，表明制造商正在降价促销，以便在几个贸易伙伴加征关税之前转移库存。【原文：China's export growth slowed sharply in September while imports also unexpectedly decelerated, undershooting forecasts by big margins and suggesting manufacturers are slashing prices to move inventory ahead of tariffs from several trade partners.】

item.title: 对欧洲经济而言，美国大选风险大于上升空间
item.description: 对于欧洲经济而言，11 月 5 日的美国大选提供了一个 "最不坏 "的结果，即卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）出任总统，或与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二次交锋，后者有可能比第一次更加伤痕累累。【原文：For Europe's economy, the Nov. 5 U.S. election offers a "least bad" outcome of a challenging Kamala Harris presidency or a second encounter with Donald Trump which threatens to be yet more bruising than the first.】

item.title: 2024 年诺贝尔奖直播：经济科学奖即将揭晓
item.description: 经济学奖将是今年颁发的最后一个诺贝尔奖。【原文：The economics prize will be the last Nobel to be awarded this year.】

item.title: 图片显示中国商飞 ARJ21 支线飞机喷涂 C909 商标
item.description: 据航空爱好者论坛和中国社交媒体上发布的照片显示，中国商飞公司为其一架 ARJ21 支线喷气机喷涂了 C909 品牌，与该公司其他机型的命名惯例保持一致。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC has painted one of its ARJ21 regional jets with C909 branding, aligning with the manufacturer's naming conventions for its other models, according to photos posted on aviation enthusiast forums and Chinese social media.】

item.title: 中国刺激经济的承诺给房地产业带来的是希望而非信心
item.description: 中国金融业专业人士张晶（音译）从最近的股市上涨中赚到了足够多的钱，可以考虑跳上住房阶梯，但她希望在购房前能听到政府更多的意见。【原文：Chinese finance industry professional Zhang Jing made enough money from a recent stock market rally to consider hopping on the housing ladder but wants to hear more from the government before making a purchase.】

item.title: 黄油价格飙升，面包师为代价高昂的圣诞节做好准备
item.description: 近几个月来，黄油价格一路飙升，在欧洲各地的交易价格屡创新高，这对面包师和糕点师来说是个坏消息，因为他们正在准备圣诞庆祝活动，而且已经面临巧克力和糖的高成本。【原文：Butter prices have rocketed in recent months, trading at record highs across Europe in bad news for bakers and pastry makers as they prepare for Christmas celebrations and already face high chocolate and sugar costs.】
